def minimum_time_to_watch_videos(n: int, m: int, arr: list) -> int:
    """
    Calculate the minimum time required to watch all videos given the constraints.

    Parameters:
    n (int): The number of videos.
    m (int): The size of the hard disk in megabytes.
    arr (list): A list of integers representing the sizes of the videos in megabytes.

    Returns:
    int: The minimum time required to watch all videos.
    """
    arr.sort()
    aa = 1
    i = 0
    j = n - 1
    while i < j:
        if arr[i] + arr[j] > m:
            j -= 1
            aa += 1
        else:
            i += 1
            j -= 1
    return sum(arr) + 1 + aa

    arr (list): A list of integers representing the sizes of the videos in megabytes.

    Returns:
    int: The minimum time required to watch all videos.
    """
    arr.sort()
    aa = 0
    i = 0
    j = n - 1
    while i < j:
        if arr[i] + arr[j] > m:
            j -= 1
            aa += 1
        else:
            i += 2
            j -= 1
    return sum(arr) + 1 + aa
